price: Memmisa mo (nsεmpa a mereka kyerε mo no ho) akatua, mmom m’akatua deε εwͻ Abͻdeε nyinaa Wura no hͻ.
arabic: وَمَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā asalukum ʿalayhi min ajrin in ajriya illā ʿalā rabbi al-ʿālamīna
